trans-unit.source: The notification emitted is a Notification instance whose user data is set to a CompositeData that represents a MemoryNotificationInfo object containing information about the memory pool when the notification was constructed. The CompositeData contains the attributes as described in MemoryNotificationInfo.

trans-unit.source: The notification sequence number within the source object. It's a serial number identifying a particular instance of notification in the context of the notification source. The notification model does not assume that notifications will be received in the same order that they are sent. The sequence number helps listeners to sort received notifications.
trans-unit.target: 源对象内的通知序列号。这是一个识别通知源上下文中某一特定通知实例的序列号。通知模型并不假设通知会以相同的发送顺序被接收。序列号可以帮助听众对收到的通知进行分类。

trans-unit.source: The number of elements covered by the stream source is known and the intermediate operation, peek, does not inject into or remove elements from the stream (as may be the case for flatMap or filter operations). trans-unit.source: The number of elements covered by the stream source, a List, is known and the intermediate operation, peek, does not inject into or remove elements from the stream (as may be the case for flatMap or filter operations). Thus the count is the size of the List and there is no need to execute the pipeline and, as a side-effect, print out the list elements.
trans-unit.target: 流源 List 所覆盖的元素数量是已知的，并且中间操作 peek 不会注入到流中或从流中删除元素（对于 flatMap 或 filter 操作可能就是这种情况）。因此，计数就是 List 的大小，并且不需要执行管道，并且，副作用是，打印出list元素。

trans-unit.source: The number of events generated for an event request can be controlled through filters. Filters provide additional constraints that an event must satisfy before it is placed on the event queue. Multiple filters can be used by making multiple calls to filter addition methods such as ExceptionRequest.addClassFilter(java.lang.String classPattern). Filters are added to an event one at a time only while the event is disabled. Multiple filters are applied with CUT-OFF AND, in the order it was added to the request. Only events that satisfy all filters are placed in the event queue.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过过滤器控制为事件请求生成的事件数。过滤器提供了事件在放入事件队列之前必须满足的其他约束。通过多次调用过滤器添加方法（例如 ExceptionRequest.addClassFilter(java.lang.String classPattern) ),可以使用多个过滤器。仅在禁用事件的情况下，才一次将过滤器添加到一个事件中。多个过滤器会按照添加到请求中的顺序应用于“切断与”功能。只有满足所有过滤条件的事件才会放入事件队列。

trans-unit.source: The object crs now contains the data from the table EMPLOYEES, just as the object rs does. The difference is that the cursor for crs can be moved forward, backward, or to a particular row even if the cursor for rs can move only forward. In addition, crs is updatable even if rs is not because by default, a CachedRowSet object is both scrollable and updatable.

trans-unit.source: The object acts as a Flow.Subscriber<List<ByteBuffer>> to the HTTP Client implementation, which publishes lists of ByteBuffers containing the response body. The Flow of data, as well as the order of ByteBuffers in the Flow lists, is a strictly ordered representation of the response body. Both the Lists and the ByteBuffers, once passed to the subscriber, are no longer used by the HTTP Client. The subscriber converts the incoming buffers of data to some higher-level Java type T.
trans-unit.target: 该对象充当HTTP客户端实现的 Flow.Subscriber < List < ByteBuffer >>，该实现发布包含响应主体的ByteBuffer列表。数据流以及流列表中ByteBuffer的顺序是响应主体的严格排序表示。一旦传递给订户，列表和字节缓冲区都将不再被HTTP客户端使用。订户将数据转换到一些更高级别的Java类型的输入缓冲器 T 。

trans-unit.source: The object that implements the ActionListener interface gets this ActionEvent when the event occurs. The listener is therefore spared the details of processing individual mouse movements and mouse clicks, and can instead process a "meaningful" (semantic) event like "button pressed".
trans-unit.target: 事件发生时，实现 ActionListener 接口的对象将获取此 ActionEvent 。因此，侦听器可以省去处理单个鼠标移动和鼠标单击的详细信息，而可以处理“有意义的”（语义）事件，例如“按下按钮”。

trans-unit.source: The object that implements the ItemListener interface gets this ItemEvent when the event occurs. The listener is spared the details of processing individual mouse movements and mouse clicks, and can instead process a "meaningful" (semantic) event like "item selected" or "item deselected".
trans-unit.target: 事件发生时，实现 ItemListener 接口的对象将获取此 ItemEvent 。侦听器可以省去处理各个鼠标移动和鼠标单击的详细信息，而可以处理“有意义的”（语义）事件，例如“选定项目”或“取消选定项目”。

trans-unit.source: The object that implements the TextListener interface gets this TextEvent when the event occurs. The listener is spared the details of processing individual mouse movements and key strokes Instead, it can process a "meaningful" (semantic) event like "text changed".
trans-unit.target: 事件发生时，实现 TextListener 接口的对象将获取此 TextEvent 。侦听器无需处理单个鼠标移动和按键的细节，而是可以处理“有意义的”（语义）事件，例如“文本已更改”。

trans-unit.source: The objects of the classes implementing Stroke must be read-only because Graphics2D does not clone these objects either when they are set as an attribute with the setStroke method or when the Graphics2D object is itself cloned. If a Stroke object is modified after it is set in the Graphics2D context then the behavior of subsequent rendering would be undefined.
trans-unit.target: 实现类的对象 Stroke 必须只读的，因为 Graphics2D 并不克隆这些对象或者当它们被设置为与所述一个属性 setStroke 方法或当 Graphics2D 的对象是自身克隆。如果在 Graphics2D 上下文中设置 Stroke 对象后对其进行了修改，则后续渲染的行为将不确定。

trans-unit.source: The official ISO-8601 standard does not define eras, however IsoChronology does. It defines two eras, 'CE' from year one onwards and 'BCE' from year zero backwards. Since dates before the Julian-Gregorian cutover are not in line with history, the cutover between 'BCE' and 'CE' is also not aligned with the commonly used eras, often referred to using 'BC' and 'AD'.
trans-unit.target: 官方的ISO-8601标准没有定义时代，但是 IsoChronology 定义了时代。它定义了两个时代，从第一年开始的“ CE”和从零年开始的“ BCE”。由于朱利安-格里高利安转换之前的日期与历史不符，因此“ BCE”和“ CE”之间的转换也不符合通常使用的“ BC”和“ AD”时代。

trans-unit.source: The offset-based date-time types OffsetTime and OffsetDateTime, are intended primarily for use with network protocols and database access. For example, most databases cannot automatically store a time-zone like 'Europe/Paris', but they can store an offset like '+02:00'.
trans-unit.target: 基于偏移的日期时间类型 OffsetTime 和 OffsetDateTime 主要用于与网络协议和数据库访问一起使用。例如，大多数数据库无法自动存储诸如“欧洲/巴黎”之类的时区，但可以存储诸如“ +02：00”之类的偏移量。

trans-unit.source: The offsets are compared in the order that they occur for the same time of day around the world. Thus, an offset of +10:00 comes before an offset of +09:00 and so on down to -18:00.
trans-unit.target: 按照在世界上一天的同一时间出现的偏移量对偏移量进行比较。因此，偏移量 +10:00 在偏移量 +09:00 之前，依此类推，直到 -18:00 。

trans-unit.source: The only difference between the serial and parallel versions of this example is the creation of the initial stream, using "parallelStream()" instead of "stream()". The stream pipeline is executed sequentially or in parallel depending on the mode of the stream on which the terminal operation is invoked. The sequential or parallel mode of a stream can be determined with the BaseStream.isParallel() method, and the stream's mode can be modified with the BaseStream.sequential() and BaseStream.parallel() operations. The most recent sequential or parallel mode setting applies to the execution of the entire stream pipeline.
trans-unit.target: 此示例的串行和并行版本之间的唯一区别是使用“ parallelStream() ”而不是“ stream() ”创建初始流。根据调用终端操作的流的模式，顺序或并行执行流管道。可以使用 BaseStream.isParallel() 方法确定流的顺序模式或并行模式，并且可以使用 BaseStream.sequential() 和 BaseStream.parallel() 操作修改流的模式。最新的顺序或并行模式设置适用于整个流管道的执行。

trans-unit.source: The only difference between the serial and parallel versions of this example is the creation of the initial stream, using "parallelStream()" instead of "stream()". When the terminal operation is initiated, the stream pipeline is executed sequentially or in parallel depending on the orientation of the stream on which it is invoked. Whether a stream will execute in serial or parallel can be determined with the isParallel() method, and the orientation of a stream can be modified with the BaseStream.sequential() and BaseStream.parallel() operations. When the terminal operation is initiated, the stream pipeline is executed sequentially or in parallel depending on the mode of the stream on which it is invoked.
trans-unit.target: 此示例的串行和并行版本之间的唯一区别是使用“ parallelStream() ”而不是“ stream() ” 创建初始流。启动终端操作后，将根据调用流的方向依次或并行执行流管道。可以使用 isParallel() 方法确定流是串行执行还是并行执行，并且可以使用 BaseStream.sequential() 和 BaseStream.parallel() 操作修改流的方向。启动终端操作后，将根据调用流的方式依次或并行执行流管道。

trans-unit.source: The operation of this method is slightly different to similar methods using ParsePosition on java.text.Format. That class will return errors using the error index on the ParsePosition. By contrast, this method will throw a DateTimeParseException if an error occurs, with the exception containing the error index. This change in behavior is necessary due to the increased complexity of parsing and resolving dates/times in this API.
trans-unit.target: 此方法的操作与在 java.text.Format 上使用 ParsePosition 的类似方法稍有不同。该类将使用 ParsePosition 上的错误索引返回错误。相反，如果发生错误，则此方法将引发 DateTimeParseException ，但异常包含错误索引。由于此API中解析和解析日期/时间的复杂性增加，因此必须进行行为上的更改。

trans-unit.source: The operation proceeds as follows:
trans-unit.target: 操作过程如下:

trans-unit.source: The operation to perform when this action is triggered.
trans-unit.target: 触发此操作时要执行的操作。

trans-unit.source: The operation will be performed field by field with the precision of BigDecimal. Since all the fields except seconds are restricted to hold integers, any fraction produced by the computation will be carried down toward the next lower unit. For example, if you multiply "P1D" (1 day) with "0.5", then it will be 0.5 day, which will be carried down to "PT12H" (12 hours). When fractions of month cannot be meaningfully carried down to days, or year to months, this will cause an IllegalStateException to be thrown. For example if you multiple one month by 0.5.
trans-unit.target: 该操作将以 BigDecimal 的精度逐场执行。由于除秒以外的所有字段都被限制为保留整数，因此计算产生的任何分数都将被带入下一个较低的单位。例如，如果将“ P1D”（1天）与“ 0.5”相乘，则将是0.5天，这将被带入“ PT12H”（12小时）。如果无法将月份的零头有意义地减少到几天或一年到几个月，则将引发 IllegalStateException 。例如，如果您将一个月乘以0.5。

trans-unit.source: The options objects should contain either instances of Components, (which are added directly) or Strings (which are wrapped in a JButton). If you provide Components, you must ensure that when the Component is clicked it messages setValue in the created JOptionPane.
trans-unit.target: options对象应该包含 Component 的实例（直接添加）或 Strings （包装在 JButton 中）。如果提供 Component ，则必须确保在单击 Component 时在创建的 JOptionPane 中向其发送 setValue 消息。

trans-unit.source: The order in which notifications will be delivered is unspecified. The default implementation provided in the Observable class will notify Observers in the order in which they registered interest, but subclasses may change this order, use no guaranteed order, deliver notifications on separate threads, or may guarantee that their subclass follows this order, as they choose.
trans-unit.target: 传递通知的顺序是未指定的。在Observable类中提供的默认实现将按照观察者登记兴趣的顺序通知观察者,但子类可以改变这个顺序,不使用保证的顺序,在不同的线程上传递通知,或者可以保证他们的子类遵循这个顺序,由他们选择。

trans-unit.source: The order in which the certificates are presented to the PKIXCertPathChecker may be either in the forward direction (from target to most-trusted CA) or in the reverse direction (from most-trusted CA to target). A PKIXCertPathChecker implementation must support reverse checking (the ability to perform its checks when it is presented with certificates in the reverse direction) and may support forward checking (the ability to perform its checks when it is presented with certificates in the forward direction). The isForwardCheckingSupported method indicates whether forward checking is supported.
trans-unit.target: 证书提交给 PKIXCertPathChecker 的顺序可以是正向（从目标到最受信任的CA），也可以是反方向（从最受信任的CA到目标）。甲 PKIXCertPathChecker 实现必须支持反向检查（执行其检查的能力时，它呈现证书以相反的方向），并可以（当它呈现证书在向前方向上执行其检查的能力）支持向前检查。该 isForwardCheckingSupported 方法指示正向检查是否支持。

trans-unit.source: The order in which the certificates are presented to the PKIXCertPathChecker may be either in the forward direction (from target to most-trusted CA) or in the reverse direction (from most-trusted CA to target). A PKIXCertPathChecker implementation must support reverse checking (the ability to perform its checks when it is presented with certificates in the reverse direction) and may support forward checking (the ability to perform its checks when it is presented with certificates in the forward direction). The isForwardCheckingSupported method indicates whether forward checking is supported.
trans-unit.target: 将证书提供给 PKIXCertPathChecker 的顺序可以是正向（从目标到最受信任的CA），也可以是反方向（从最受信任的CA到目标）。甲 PKIXCertPathChecker 实现必须支持反向检查（执行其检查的能力时，它呈现证书以相反的方向），并可以（当它呈现证书在向前方向上执行其检查的能力）支持向前检查。该 isForwardCheckingSupported 方法指示正向检查是否支持。

trans-unit.source: The order of Catalogs in the returned stream is the same as the order in which the corresponding nextCatalog entries appear in the current catalog. The alternative catalogs from the input file list are appended to the end of the stream in the order they are entered.
trans-unit.target: 返回流中目录的顺序与相应的 nextCatalog 条目在当前目录中出现的顺序相同。输入文件列表中的替代目录按照输入顺序附加到流的末尾。

trans-unit.source: The order of MBeans in the ClassLoaderRepository is significant. For any two MBeans X and Y in the ClassLoaderRepository, X must appear before Y if the registration of X was completed before the registration of Y started. If X and Y were registered concurrently, their order is indeterminate. The registration of an MBean corresponds to the call to MBeanServer.registerMBean(java.lang.Object, javax.management.ObjectName) or one of the MBeanServer.createMBean methods.
trans-unit.target: MBean在 ClassLoaderRepository 中的顺序很重要。对于 ClassLoaderRepository 中的任何两个MBean X和Y，如果X的注册在开始Y之前完成，则X必须出现在Y之前。如果X和Y同时注册，则它们的顺序是不确定的。 MBean的注册与对 MBeanServer.registerMBean(java.lang.Object, javax.management.ObjectName) 或 MBeanServer .createMBean 方法之一的调用相对应。

trans-unit.source: The order of MBeans in the ClassLoaderRepository is significant. For any two MBeans X and Y in the ClassLoaderRepository, X must appear before Y if the registration of X was completed before the registration of Y started. If X and Y were registered concurrently, their order is indeterminate. The registration of an MBean corresponds to the call to MBeanServer.registerMBean(java.lang.Object, javax.management.ObjectName) or one of the MBeanServer.createMBean methods.
trans-unit.target: MBean在 ClassLoaderRepository 中的顺序很重要。对于 ClassLoaderRepository 中的任何两个MBean X和Y，如果X的注册在开始Y之前完成，则X必须出现在Y之前。如果X和Y同时注册，则它们的顺序是不确定的。 MBean的注册与对 MBeanServer.registerMBean(java.lang.Object, javax.management.ObjectName) 或 MBeanServer .createMBean 方法之一的调用相对应。

trans-unit.source: The order of accumulation within or across threads is not guaranteed and cannot be depended upon, so this class is only applicable to functions for which the order of accumulation does not matter. The supplied accumulator function should be side-effect-free, since it may be re-applied when attempted updates fail due to contention among threads. For predictable results, the accumulator function should be associative and commutative. The function is applied with an existing value (or identity) as one argument, and a given update as the other argument. For example, to maintain a running maximum value, you could supply Long::max along with Long.MIN_VALUE as the identity.
trans-unit.target: 不能保证并且不能依赖于线程内或线程间的累加顺序，因此此类仅适用于那些累加顺序无关紧要的函数。所提供的累加器功能应无副作用，因为当尝试更新由于线程间争用而失败时，可以重新应用该累加器功能。为了获得可预测的结果，累加器功能应具有关联性和可交换性。该函数以现有值（或标识）作为一个参数，并以给定的更新作为另一个参数来应用。例如，要保持运行的最大值，可以提供 Long::max 以及 Long.MIN_VALUE 作为标识。

trans-unit.source: The order of accumulation within or across threads is not guaranteed and cannot be depended upon, so this class is only applicable to functions for which the order of accumulation does not matter. The supplied accumulator function should be side-effect-free, since it may be re-applied when attempted updates fail due to contention among threads. The function is applied with the current value as its first argument, and the given update as the second argument. For example, to maintain a running maximum value, you could supply Long::max along with Long.MIN_VALUE as the identity.
trans-unit.target: 不能保证并且不能依赖于线程内或线程间的累加顺序，因此此类仅适用于那些累加顺序无关紧要的函数。所提供的累加器功能应无副作用，因为当尝试更新由于线程之间的争用而失败时，可以重新应用该累加器功能。应用该函数时，将当前值作为其第一个参数，并将给定的update作为第二个参数。例如，要保持运行的最大值，可以提供 Long::max 以及 Long.MIN_VALUE 作为标识。

trans-unit.source: The order of attributes in the list is unspecified, and will vary from implementation to implementation.
trans-unit.target: 列表中的属性顺序是没有规定的,不同的实现方式会有差异。

trans-unit.source: The order of elements in the list is the same as the order of the provided arguments, or of the elements in the provided array.
trans-unit.target: 列表中元素的顺序与提供的参数或提供的数组中元素的顺序相同。

trans-unit.source: The order of events in this interface is very important, and mirrors the order of information in the document itself. For example, all of an element's content (character data, processing instructions, and/or subelements) will appear, in order, between the startElement event and the corresponding endElement event.
trans-unit.target: 该接口中事件的顺序非常重要,它反映了文档本身的信息顺序。例如,一个元素的所有内容(字符数据、处理指令和/或子元素)将按顺序出现在startElement事件和相应的endElement事件之间。

trans-unit.source: The order of the color indices is specified by the ColorSpace. Typically, this reflects the name of the color space type (for example, TYPE_RGB), index 0 corresponds to red, index 1 to green, and index 2 to blue.
trans-unit.target: 颜色索引的顺序由 ColorSpace 指定。通常，这反映了颜色空间类型的名称（例如TYPE_RGB），索引0对应于红色，索引1对应于绿色，索引2对应于蓝色。

trans-unit.source: The order of the list specifies the preference order of the client or server. An implementation should allow configuration of the meaning of these values. An application may use the Java Cryptography Extension (JCE) with JCE-aware mechanisms to control the selection of cipher suites that match the strength values.
trans-unit.target: 列表的顺序指定了客户端或服务器的优先顺序。实现应该允许配置这些值的含义。应用程序可以使用具有JCE感知机制的Java密码学扩展(JCE)来控制选择与强度值相匹配的密码套件。

trans-unit.source: The order of the list specifies the preference order of the client or server. If this property is absent, the default qop is "auth". The value of this constant is "javax.security.sasl.qop".
trans-unit.target: 列表的顺序指定了客户端或服务器的首选项顺序。如果缺少此属性，则默认qop为 "auth" 。该常数的值为 "javax.security.sasl.qop" 。

trans-unit.source: The order of the value descriptors specifies the index to use when setting event values.

trans-unit.source: The ordering of cards is determined by the container's own internal ordering of its component objects. CardLayout defines a set of methods that allow an application to flip through these cards sequentially, or to show a specified card. The addLayoutComponent(java.awt.Component, java.lang.Object) method can be used to associate a string identifier with a given card for fast random access.
trans-unit.target: 卡的排序由容器本身对其组件对象的内部排序确定。 CardLayout 定义了一组方法，这些方法允许应用程序顺序浏览这些卡或显示指定的卡。的 addLayoutComponent(java.awt.Component, java.lang.Object) 方法可用于将一个字符串标识符与给定卡进行快速随机存取相关联。

trans-unit.source: The ordering of lock reacquisition for threads returning from waiting methods is the same as for threads initially acquiring the lock, which is in the default case not specified, but for fair locks favors those threads that have been waiting the longest.
trans-unit.target: 从等待方法返回的线程的锁重新获取顺序与最初获取锁的线程的顺序相同（默认情况下未指定），但对于公平锁，优先使用等待时间最长的线程。

trans-unit.source: The ordering of side-effects may be surprising. Even when a pipeline is constrained to produce a result that is consistent with the encounter order of the stream source (for example, IntStream.range(0,5).parallel().map(x -> x*2).toArray() must produce [0, 2, 4, 6, 8]), no guarantees are made as to the order in which the mapper function is applied to individual elements, or in what thread any behavioral parameter is executed for a given element.
trans-unit.target: 副作用的顺序可能令人惊讶。即使当管道被约束以产生与流源的遇到顺序一致的结果时（例如， IntStream.range(0,5).parallel().map(x -> x*2).toArray() 必须产生 [0, 2, 4, 6, 8] ），对于映射器函数应用于单个元素的顺序或给定元素执行任何行为参数的顺序不做任何保证。

trans-unit.source: The original value for a RowSet object is the value it had before the last synchronization with the underlying data source. If there have been no synchronizations, the original value will be the value with which the RowSet object was populated. This method is called internally when an application calls the method acceptChanges and the SyncProvider object has been implemented to check for conflicts. If this is the case, the writer compares the original value with the value currently in the data source to check for conflicts.

To generate Diffie-Hellman system parameters, for example, the parameter generation values usually consist of the size of the prime modulus and the size of the random exponent, both specified in number of bits.

trans-unit.source: The outer range is minimum,maximum and the inner range is value,value+extent. The inner range must lie within the outer one, i.e. value must be less than or equal to maximum and value+extent must greater than or equal to minimum, and maximum must be greater than or equal to minimum. There are a few features of this model that one might find a little surprising. These quirks exist for the convenience of the Swing BoundedRangeModel clients, such as Slider and ScrollBar.
trans-unit.target: 外部范围是 minimum,maximum ，内部范围是 value,value+extent 。内部范围必须在外部范围之内，即， value 必须小于或等于 maximum 并且 value+extent 必须大于或等于 minimum ，并且 maximum 必须大于或等于 minimum 。该模型的一些功能可能会让您感到有些惊讶。存在这些怪癖是为了方便Swing BoundedRangeModel客户端，例如 Slider 和 ScrollBar 。

trans-unit.source: The output IO stream is buffered, but is flushed after each LogRecord is written.

trans-unit.source: The output device is marking media.
trans-unit.target: 输出设备为打标介质。

trans-unit.source: The output device is marking media. This value is useful for printers which spend a great deal of time processing (1) when no marking is happening and then want to show that marking is now happening or (2) when the job is in the process of being canceled or aborted while the job remains in the PROCESSING state, but the marking has not yet stopped so that impression or sheet counts are still increasing for the job.
trans-unit.target: 输出设备是标记介质。该值对于以下打印机很有用：在打印机上花费大量时间（1）当没有标记发生时，然后想要显示标记正在发生；或（2）当作业正在被取消或中止的同时打印机正在工作时。作业仍处于“ PROCESSING 状态，但是标记尚未停止，因此该作业的印数或张数仍在增加。

trans-unit.source: The output device is marking media. This value is useful for printers which spend a great deal of time processing (1) when no marking is happening and then want to show that marking is now happening or (2) when the job is in the process of being canceled or aborted while the job remains in the PROCESSING state, but the marking has not yet stopped so that impression or sheet counts are still increasing for the job.
trans-unit.target: 输出设备是打标介质。此值对于打印机来说非常有用,因为打印机需要花费大量的时间来处理 (1)在没有打标的时候,然后希望显示正在打标,或者 (2)当作业处于取消或中止的过程中,而作业仍然处于PROCESSING状态,但打标尚未停止,因此作业的印数或页数仍然在增加。

trans-unit.source: The overall effect is that the total size moves that same percentage, k, towards the total minimum or maximum and that percentage guarantees accommodation of the required space, DELTA.
trans-unit.target: 总的效果是,总的规模使同样的百分比,k,向总的最小或最大移动,这个百分比保证了所需空间的容纳,DELTA。

trans-unit.source: The overall effect is to force all future readers of each call site's target to accept the most recently stored value. ("Most recently" is reckoned relative to the syncAll itself.) Conversely, the syncAll call may block until all readers have (somehow) decached all previous versions of each call site's target.
trans-unit.target: 总体效果是迫使每个呼叫站点目标的所有未来读者接受最新存储的价值。（相对于 syncAll 本身，则认为是“最近” 。）相反， syncAll 调用可能会阻塞，直到所有读取器都（以某种方式）对每个呼叫站点目标的所有先前版本进行了缓存为止。

trans-unit.source: The overall orientation of the grid depends on the container's ComponentOrientation property. For horizontal left-to-right orientations, grid coordinate (0,0) is in the upper left corner of the container with x increasing to the right and y increasing downward. For horizontal right-to-left orientations, grid coordinate (0,0) is in the upper right corner of the container with x increasing to the left and y increasing downward.
trans-unit.target: 网格的总体方向取决于容器的 ComponentOrientation 属性。对于从左到右的水平方向，网格坐标（0,0）位于容器的左上角，其中x向右增大，y向下增大。对于从右到左的水平方向，网格坐标（0,0）位于容器的右上角，其中x向左增加，y向下增加。

trans-unit.source: The packer engine applies various transformations to the input JAR file, making the pack stream highly compressible by a compressor such as gzip or zip.
trans-unit.target: 打包机引擎对输入的JAR文件进行各种转换,使打包流能被gzip或zip等压缩器高度压缩。

trans-unit.source: The packer engine applies various transformations to the input JAR file, making the pack stream highly compressible by a compressor such as gzip or zip. An instance of the engine can be obtained using Pack200.newPacker(). The high degree of compression is achieved by using a number of techniques described in the JSR 200 specification. Some of the techniques are sorting, re-ordering and co-location of the constant pool.
trans-unit.target: 打包器引擎对输入的JAR文件应用了各种转换，从而使打包流可以被gzip或zip之类的压缩器高度压缩。可以使用 Pack200.newPacker() 获得引擎的实例。通过使用JSR 200规范中描述的多种技术，可以实现高度压缩。其中一些技术是对常量池进行排序，重新排序和共置。

trans-unit.source: The packer engine applies various transformations to the input JAR file, making the pack stream highly compressible by a compressor such as gzip or zip. An instance of the engine can be obtained using Pack200.newPacker(). The high degree of compression is achieved by using a number of techniques described in the JSR 200 specification. Some of the techniques are sorting, re-ordering and co-location of the constant pool.
trans-unit.target: 打包器引擎将各种转换应用于输入的JAR文件，从而使打包流可以通过gzip或zip之类的压缩器高度压缩。可以使用 Pack200.newPacker() 获得引擎的实例。通过使用JSR 200规范中描述的多种技术，可以实现高度压缩。一些技术是常量池的排序，重新排序和共置。

trans-unit.source: The painting architecture of Swing requires an opaque JComponent to exist in the containment hierarchy above all other components. This is typically provided by way of the content pane. If you replace the content pane, it is recommended that you make the content pane opaque by way of setOpaque(true). Additionally, if the content pane overrides paintComponent, it will need to completely fill in the background in an opaque color in paintComponent.
trans-unit.target: Swing的绘画体系结构要求在所有其他组件之上的容纳层次结构中存在一个不透明的 JComponent 。这通常是通过内容窗格提供的。如果替换内容窗格，建议通过 setOpaque(true) 使内容窗格不透明。另外，如果内容窗格重写 paintComponent ，它需要在后台完全填补了不透明颜色 paintComponent 。

trans-unit.source: The parameter item represents the context the XPath expression will be operated on. The type of the context is implementation-dependent. If the value is null, the operation must have no dependency on the context, otherwise an XPathExpressionException will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 参数 item 表示将对XPath表达式进行操作的上下文。上下文的类型取决于实现。如果该值为 null ，则该操作必须不依赖于上下文，否则将抛出XPathExpressionException。

trans-unit.source: The parameter n must be in the range 0 through 999999999, inclusive. ZERO.pow(0) returns ONE. Note that future releases may expand the allowable exponent range of this method.

trans-unit.source: The parameter list (V A...) of the body is called the internal parameter list. It will constrain the parameter lists of the other loop parts.
trans-unit.target: 主体的参数列表 (V A...) 称为内部参数列表。它将约束其他循环部分的参数列表。

trans-unit.source: The parameter list (V I A...) of the body contributes to a list of types called the internal parameter list. It will constrain the parameter lists of the other loop parts.
trans-unit.target: 主体的参数列表 (V I A...) 构成了称为内部参数列表的类型列表。它将约束其他循环部分的参数列表。

trans-unit.source: The parameter list (V T A...) of the body contributes to a list of types called the internal parameter list. It will constrain the parameter lists of the other loop parts.
trans-unit.target: 主体的参数列表 (V T A...) 构成了称为内部参数列表的类型列表。它将约束其他循环部分的参数列表。

trans-unit.source: The parameter list for every non-omitted, non-init (step, pred, and fini) function must be effectively identical to the internal parameter list (V... A...).
trans-unit.target: 每个不省略，不初始化（step，pred和fini）函数的参数列表必须与内部参数列表 (V... A...) 有效地相同。

trans-unit.source: The parameter list for init functions will be adjusted to the external parameter list. (Note that their parameter lists are already effectively identical to this list.)
trans-unit.target: init函数的参数列表将调整为外部参数列表。(注意,它们的参数列表已经和这个列表有效相同了)。

trans-unit.source: The parameter list for the resulting loop handle will be the external parameter list (A...).
trans-unit.target: 结果循环句柄的参数列表将是外部参数列表 (A...) 。

trans-unit.source: The parameter list of iterations (of some form (A*)) must be effectively identical to the external parameter list (A...).
trans-unit.target: iterations 的参数列表（某种形式 (A*) ）必须与外部参数列表 (A...) 有效地相同。

trans-unit.source: The parameter list of start (of some form (A*)) must be effectively identical to the external parameter list (A...).

trans-unit.source: The parameter names used by the DOMConfiguration object are defined throughout the DOM Level 3 specifications. Names are case-insensitive. To avoid possible conflicts, as a convention, names referring to parameters defined outside the DOM specification should be made unique. Because parameters are exposed as properties in names are recommended to follow the section 5.16 Identifiers of [Unicode] with the addition of the character '-' (HYPHEN-MINUS) but it is not enforced by the DOM implementation. DOM Level 3 Core Implementations are required to recognize all parameters defined in this specification. Some parameter values may also be required to be supported by the implementation. Refer to the definition of the parameter to know if a value must be supported or not.
trans-unit.target: 整个DOM级别3规范都定义了 DOMConfiguration 对象使用的参数名称。名称不区分大小写。为了避免可能的冲突，按照惯例，引用DOM规范之外定义的参数的名称应唯一。由于建议将参数公开为名称中的属性，因此建议遵循[Unicode]的5.16节标识符，并添加字符“-”（HYPHEN-MINUS），但DOM实现不强制执行。需要DOM Level 3核心实现才能识别此规范中定义的所有参数。实现可能还需要支持某些参数值。请参阅参数的定义以了解是否必须支持值。

trans-unit.source: The parameter of this method is the number of invocations being requested from this WebSocket to the associated listener, not the number of messages. Sometimes a message may be delivered to the listener in a single invocation, but not always. For example, Ping, Pong and Close messages are delivered in a single invocation of onPing, onPong and onClose methods respectively. However, whether or not Text and Binary messages are delivered in a single invocation of onText and onBinary methods depends on the boolean argument (last) of these methods. If last is false, then there is more to a message than has been delivered to the invocation.
trans-unit.target: 此方法的参数是从此WebSocket请求到关联的侦听器的调用次数，而不是消息的数目。有时，消息可能会在一次调用中传递给侦听器，但并非总是如此。例如，分别在 onPing ， onPong 和 onClose 方法的单次调用中传递Ping，Pong和Close消息。但是，是否在 onText 和 onBinary 方法的单次调用中传递Text和Binary消息取决于这些方法的布尔参数（ last ）。如果 last 为 false ，那么消息中传递给调用的内容还不止于此。

trans-unit.source: The parent of this path object consists of this path's root component, if any, and each element in the path except for the farthest from the root in the directory hierarchy. This method does not access the file system; the path or its parent may not exist. Furthermore, this method does not eliminate special names such as "." and ".." that may be used in some implementations. On UNIX for example, the parent of "/a/b/c" is "/a/b", and the parent of "x/y/." is "x/y". This method may be used with the normalize method, to eliminate redundant names, for cases where shell-like navigation is required.
trans-unit.target: 该路径对象的父级由该路径的根组件（如果有）以及路径中除目录层次结构中距根最远的每个元素组成。此方法不访问文件系统。该路径或其父路径可能不存在。此外，此方法不会消除特殊名称，例如“。”。和在某些实现中可以使用的“ ..”。例如，在UNIX上，“ /a/b/c ”的父级是“ /a/b ”，而 "x/y/. ”的父级是“ x/y ”。在需要类外壳导航的情况下，此方法可以与 normalize 方法一起使用，以消除多余的名称。

trans-unit.source: The parser drives the ParserCallback, which is provided by HTMLDocument. To change the callback, subclass HTMLDocument and reimplement the createDefaultDocument method to return document that produces a different reader. The reader controls how the document is structured. Although the Document provides HTML support by default, there is nothing preventing support of non-HTML tags that result in alternative element structures.
trans-unit.target: 解析器驱动ParserCallback,它由HTMLDocument提供。要改变回调,请子类HTMLDocument并重新实现createDefaultDocument方法,以返回产生不同阅读器的文档。阅读器控制文档的结构方式。虽然Document默认提供了HTML支持,但并不妨碍对非HTML标签的支持,这些标签会导致其他元素结构。

trans-unit.source: The parser for a variable width value such as this normally behaves greedily, accepting as many digits as possible. This behavior can be affected by 'adjacent value parsing'. See appendValue(java.time.temporal.TemporalField, int) for full details.

trans-unit.source: The parser is replaceable. The default parser is the Hot Java parser which is DTD based. A different DTD can be used, or an entirely different parser can be used. To change the parser, reimplement the getParser method. The default parser is dynamically loaded when first asked for, so the class files will never be loaded if an alternative parser is used. The default parser is in a separate package called parser below this package.
trans-unit.target: 解析器是可以替换的。默认的解析器是基于DTD的Hot Java解析器。可以使用不同的DTD,也可以使用完全不同的解析器。要改变解析器,请重新实现getParser方法。默认的解析器在第一次被请求时是动态加载的,所以如果使用了另一种解析器,类文件永远不会被加载。默认的解析器在这个包下面的一个单独的包里,叫做parser。

trans-unit.source: The parser treats \r and \r\n as \n. Newlines after starttags and before end tags are ignored just as specified in the SGML/HTML specification.
trans-unit.target: 解析器将\rr和\r\n视为\n。在起始标签后和结束标签前的换行将被忽略,就像SGML/HTML规范中规定的那样。

trans-unit.source: The parser will call this method after each Element start tag has been scanned, but before the remainder of the Element is processed.
trans-unit.target: 解析器将在扫描每个 Element 起始标签之后但在处理其余 Element 之前调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: The parser will call this method after each Element start tag has been scanned, but before the remainder of the Element is processed. The intent is to allow the element, including any children, to be efficiently skipped. Note that only element nodes are passed to the startElement function.
trans-unit.target: 解析器将在扫描每个 Element 起始标签之后但在处理其余 Element 之前调用此方法。目的是允许有效地跳过元素（包括任何子元素）。请注意，只有元素节点才传递给 startElement 函数。

trans-unit.source: The parser will call this method before opening any external entity except the top-level document entity. Such entities include the external DTD subset and external parameter entities referenced within the DTD (in either case, only if the parser reads external parameter entities), and external general entities referenced within the document element (if the parser reads external general entities). The application may request that the parser locate the entity itself, that it use an alternative URI, or that it use data provided by the application (as a character or byte input stream).
trans-unit.target: 解析器将在打开除顶层文档实体之外的任何外部实体之前调用该方法。这些实体包括外部 DTD 子集和 DTD 内引用的外部参数实体(无论哪种情况,只有当解析器读取外部参数实体时),以及文档元素内引用的外部一般实体(如果解析器读取外部一般实体)。应用程序可以要求解析器定位实体本身,也可以要求解析器使用替代的URI,或者要求解析器使用应用程序提供的数据(作为字符或字节输入流)。

trans-unit.source: The parsing and conversion to a path object is inherently implementation dependent. In the simplest case, the path string is rejected, and InvalidPathException thrown, if the path string contains characters that cannot be converted to characters that are legal to the file store. For example, on UNIX systems, the NUL (\u0000) character is not allowed to be present in a path. An implementation may choose to reject path strings that contain names that are longer than those allowed by any file store, and where an implementation supports a complex path syntax, it may choose to reject path strings that are badly formed.
trans-unit.target: 解析和转换为路径对象本质上取决于实现。在最简单的情况下，如果路径字符串包含无法转换为对文件存储合法的字符，则路径字符串将被拒绝并抛出 InvalidPathException 。例如，在UNIX系统上，路径中不允许存在NUL（\ u0000）字符。一个实现可以选择拒绝包含那些比任何文件存储允许更长的名称路径字符串，并在实现支持复杂的路径语法，它可以选择拒绝是路径字符串格式错误。

trans-unit.source: The part of the destination lying inside of the source is composited over the source and replaces the destination (Porter-Duff Destination Atop Source rule).

trans-unit.source: The part of the destination lying inside of the source replaces the destination (Porter-Duff Destination In Source rule).

trans-unit.target: 目的地位于源外的部分取代了目的地(Porter-Duff Destination Held Out By Source规则)。

trans-unit.source: The part of the source lying inside of the destination replaces the destination (Porter-Duff Source In Destination rule).

trans-unit.source: The particular compression scheme to be used can be specified by using the setCompressionType() method with the appropriate type string. The compression scheme specified will be honored if and only if it is compatible with the type of image being written. If the specified compression scheme is not compatible with the type of image being written then the IOException will be thrown by the BMP image writer. If the compression type is not set explicitly then getCompressionType() will return null. In this case the BMP image writer will select a compression type that supports encoding of the given image without loss of the color resolution.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用带有适当类型字符串的 setCompressionType() 方法来指定要使用的特定压缩方案。当且仅当压缩方案与要写入的图像类型兼容时，才会采用指定的压缩方案。如果指定的压缩方案与要写入的图像类型不兼容，则BMP图像编写器将抛出 IOException 。如果未明确设置压缩类型，则 getCompressionType() 将返回 null 。在这种情况下，BMP图像编写器将选择一种支持给定图像编码的压缩类型，而不会降低颜色分辨率。

trans-unit.source: The period added is a multiple of this unit. The period to be added may be negative, which is equivalent to subtraction.

trans-unit.source: The permission for which the SecurityManager will check when code that is running an application with a SecurityManager enabled, calls the DriverManager.deregisterDriver method, DriverManager.setLogWriter method, DriverManager.setLogStream (deprecated) method, SyncFactory.setJNDIContext method, SyncFactory.setLogger method, Connection.setNetworkTimeout method, or the Connection.abort method.

trans-unit.source: The permission for which the SecurityManager will check when code that is running an application with a SecurityManager enabled, calls the DriverManager.deregisterDriver method, DriverManager.setLogWriter method, DriverManager.setLogStream (deprecated) method, SyncFactory.setJNDIContext method, SyncFactory.setLogger method, Connection.setNetworkTimeout method, or the Connection.abort method. If there is no SQLPermission object, these methods throw a java.lang.SecurityException as a runtime exception.
trans-unit.target: 当运行启用了 SecurityManager 的应用程序的代码运行时， SecurityManager 将检查的权限调用 DriverManager.deregisterDriver 方法， DriverManager.setLogWriter 方法， DriverManager.setLogStream （不建议使用）方法， SyncFactory.setJNDIContext 方法， SyncFactory.setLogger 方法， Connection.setNetworkTimeout 方法或 Connection.abort 方法。如果没有 SQLPermission 对象，这些方法将抛出 java.lang.SecurityException 作为运行时异常。

trans-unit.source: The permission returned may dependent upon the state of the connection. For example, the permission before connecting may be different from that after connecting. For example, an HTTP sever, say foo.com, may redirect the connection to a different host, say bar.com. Before connecting the permission returned by the connection will represent the permission needed to connect to foo.com, while the permission returned after connecting will be to bar.com.
trans-unit.target: 返回的权限可能取决于连接的状态。例如,连接前的权限可能与连接后的权限不同。例如,一个HTTP服务器,比如foo.com,可能会将连接重定向到另一个主机,比如bar.com。在连接前,连接返回的权限将代表连接到foo.com所需要的权限,而连接后返回的权限将是连接到bar.com。

trans-unit.source: The permission which the SecurityManager will check when code that is running with a SecurityManager calls methods defined in the management interface for the Java platform.
trans-unit.target: 当使用安全管理员运行的代码调用Java平台管理界面中定义的方法时,安全管理员将检查的权限。

trans-unit.source: The permission which the SecurityManager will check when code that is running with a SecurityManager calls one of the logging control methods (such as Logger.setLevel).
trans-unit.target: 当使用安全管理员运行的代码调用一个日志控制方法(如Logger.setLevel)时,安全管理员将检查的权限。

trans-unit.source: The permissions granted to this domain are dynamic, i.e. invoking the staticPermissionsOnly() method returns false. They include both the static permissions passed to this constructor, and any permissions granted to this domain by the current Policy at the time a permission is checked.
trans-unit.target: 授予该域的权限是动态的，即，调用 staticPermissionsOnly() 方法将返回false。它们既包括传递给此构造函数的静态权限，又包括当检查权限时当前策略授予此域的任何权限。

trans-unit.source: The permissions granted to this domain are static, i.e. invoking the staticPermissionsOnly() method returns true. They contain only the ones passed to this constructor and the current Policy will not be consulted.
trans-unit.target: 授予该域的权限是静态的，即，调用 staticPermissionsOnly() 方法将返回true。它们仅包含传递给此构造函数的那些，并且将不参考当前的Policy。

trans-unit.source: The physical connection is not closed until the connection pool manager calls the PooledConnection method close. This method is generally called to have an orderly shutdown of the server or if a fatal error has made the connection unusable.
trans-unit.target: 直到连接池管理器调用 PooledConnection 方法 close ，物理连接才会关闭。通常调用此方法以有序地关闭服务器，或者如果发生致命错误使连接不可用，则将其关闭。

trans-unit.target: 图形上下文的坐标空间中的像素（0，0）对应于初始屏幕原生窗口边界的原点（请参见 getBounds() ）。

trans-unit.source: The pixels of the image are delivered using one or more calls to the setPixels method.
trans-unit.target: 图像的像素是通过一个或多个对setPixels方法的调用来传递的。

trans-unit.source: The pixels of the image are delivered using one or more calls to the setPixels method. Each call specifies the location and size of the rectangle of source pixels that are contained in the array of pixels. The specified ColorModel object should be used to convert the pixels into their corresponding color and alpha components. Pixel (m,n) is stored in the pixels array at index (n * scansize + m + off). The pixels delivered using this method are all stored as ints. this method are all stored as ints.
trans-unit.target: 图像的像素是通过对setPixels方法的一次或多次调用来传递的。每次调用都指定像素数组中包含的源像素的矩形的位置和大小。应使用指定的ColorModel对象将像素转换为其相应的颜色和alpha分量。像素(m,n)以索引(n*scansize+m+off)存储在像素数组中。使用本方法传送的像素都以ints的形式存储。

trans-unit.source: The pixels will be delivered in (multiples of) complete scanlines at a time.
trans-unit.target: 像素将以每次完整的扫描线的(倍数)传送。

trans-unit.source: The pixels will be delivered in a random order.
trans-unit.target: 像素将以随机顺序传送。

trans-unit.source: The pixels will be delivered in a random order. This tells the ImageConsumer not to use any optimizations that depend on the order of pixel delivery, which should be the default assumption in the absence of any call to the setHints method.
trans-unit.target: 像素将以随机顺序传送。这告诉ImageConsumer不要使用任何依赖于像素交付顺序的优化,这应该是在没有调用setHints方法时的默认假设。

trans-unit.source: The pixels will be delivered in a single pass.
trans-unit.target: 像素将一次性交付。

trans-unit.source: The pixels will be delivered in a single pass. Each pixel will appear in only one call to any of the setPixels methods. An example of an image format which does not meet this criterion is a progressive JPEG image which defines pixels in multiple passes, each more refined than the previous.
trans-unit.target: 这些像素将被一次性传递。每个像素将只出现在对setPixels方法的一次调用中。一个不符合这个标准的图像格式的例子是渐进式的JPEG图像,它在多个通道中定义像素,每个通道都比前一个通道更精细。

trans-unit.source: The pixels will be delivered in top-down, left-to-right order.
trans-unit.target: 像素将以从上到下、从左到右的顺序传递。

trans-unit.source: The placeholder parameters set with the BaseRowSet setter methods are stored as objects in an internal Hashtable object. Primitives are stored as their Object type. For example, byte is stored as Byte object, and int is stored as an Integer object. When the method execute is called, the values in the Hashtable object are substituted for the appropriate placeholder parameters in the command.
trans-unit.target: 使用 BaseRowSet setter方法设置的占位符参数作为对象存储在内部 Hashtable 对象中。基元存储为它们的 Object 类型。例如， byte 存储为 Byte 对象，而 int 存储为 Integer 对象。调用方法 execute 时， Hashtable 对象中的值将替换为命令中适当的占位符参数。

trans-unit.source: The platform uses signed two's complement integer arithmetic with int and long primitive types. The developer should choose the primitive type to ensure that arithmetic operations consistently produce correct results, which in some cases means the operations will not overflow the range of values of the computation. The best practice is to choose the primitive type and algorithm to avoid overflow. In cases where the size is int or long and overflow errors need to be detected, the methods addExact, subtractExact, multiplyExact, toIntExact, incrementExact, decrementExact and negateExact throw an ArithmeticException when the results overflow. For the arithmetic operations divide and absolute value, overflow occurs only with a specific minimum or maximum value and should be checked against the minimum or maximum as appropriate.
trans-unit.target: 该平台使用带整数和长基元类型的带符号的二进制补码整数算法。开发人员应选择基本类型，以确保算术运算能够始终如一地产生正确的结果，这在某些情况下意味着运算不会溢出计算值的范围。最佳实践是选择原始类型和算法以避免溢出。在情况下，大小为 int 或 long ，需要检测溢出错误，方法 addExact ， subtractExact ， multiplyExact ， toIntExact ， incrementExact ， decrementExact 和 negateExact 抛出 ArithmeticException 结果溢出时发生ArithmeticException。对于算术运算除法和绝对值，溢出仅以特定的最小值或最大值发生，并应根据最小值或最大值进行检查。

trans-unit.source: The platform uses signed two's complement integer arithmetic with int and long primitive types. The best practice is to choose the primitive type and algorithm to avoid overflow. In cases where the size is int or long and overflow errors need to be detected, the methods addExact, subtractExact, multiplyExact, and toIntExact throw an ArithmeticException when the results overflow. For other arithmetic operations such as divide, absolute value, increment by one, decrement by one, and negation overflow occurs only with a specific minimum or maximum value and should be checked against the minimum or maximum as appropriate.

trans-unit.source: The platform uses signed two's complement integer arithmetic with int and long primitive types. The best practice is to choose the primitive type and algorithm to avoid overflow. In cases where the size is int or long and overflow errors need to be detected, the methods addExact, subtractExact, multiplyExact, and toIntExact throw an ArithmeticException when the results overflow. For other arithmetic operations such as divide, absolute value, increment by one, decrement by one, and negation, overflow occurs only with a specific minimum or maximum value and should be checked against the minimum or maximum as appropriate.
trans-unit.target: 该平台使用带整数和长基元类型的带符号的二进制补码整数算法。开发人员应选择基本类型，以确保算术运算能够始终如一地产生正确的结果，这在某些情况下意味着运算不会溢出计算值的范围。最佳实践是选择原始类型和算法以避免溢出。在情况下，大小为 int 或 long ，需要检测溢出错误，方法 addExact ， subtractExact ， multiplyExact 和 toIntExact 抛出 ArithmeticException 结果溢出时。对于其他算术运算（例如，除法，绝对值，加一，减一和取反），仅在具有特定的最小值或最大值的情况下才会发生溢出，并应根据相应的最小值或最大值进行检查。

In cases where the size is int or long and overflow errors need to be detected, the methods addExact, subtractExact, multiplyExact, and toIntExact throw an ArithmeticException when the results overflow. For other arithmetic operations such as divide, absolute value, increment, decrement, and negation overflow occurs only with a specific minimum or maximum value and should be checked against the minimum or maximum as appropriate.
trans-unit.target: 该平台使用带int和long基本类型的带符号的二进制补码整数算法。开发人员应该选择原始类型，以确保算术运算始终如一地产生正确的结果，这在某些情况下意味着运算不会溢出计算值的范围。最佳实践是选择原始类型和算法以避免溢出。在情况下，大小为 int 或 long ，需要检测溢出错误，方法 addExact ， subtractExact ， multiplyExact 和 toIntExact 抛出 ArithmeticException 结果溢出时。对于其他算术运算，例如除法，绝对值，递增，递减和取反溢出仅在具有特定的最小值或最大值的情况下发生，并应根据最小值或最大值进行检查。

trans-unit.source: The positions tracking change are also generally cheap to maintain. The Position implementations (marks) store the array index and can easily calculate the sequential position from the current gap location. Changes only require update to the the marks between the old and new gap boundaries when the gap is moved, so generally updating the marks is pretty cheap. The marks are stored sorted so they can be located quickly with a binary search. This increases the cost of adding a mark, and decreases the cost of keeping the mark updated.
trans-unit.target: 位置跟踪变化一般也是便宜的维护方式。位置实现(标记)存储了数组索引,可以很容易地从当前的间隙位置计算出顺序位置。变化只需要在移动间隙时更新新旧间隙边界之间的标记,所以一般来说更新标记是很便宜的。标记是分类存储的,所以可以通过二进制搜索快速定位。这增加了添加标记的成本,降低了保持标记更新的成本。

trans-unit.source: The precise definition of this method is implementation dependent but in general it derives from this path, a path that does not contain redundant name elements. In many file systems, the "." and ".." are special names used to indicate the current directory and parent directory. In such file systems all occurrences of "." are considered redundant. If a ".." is preceded by a non-".." name then both names are considered redundant (the process to identify such names is repeated until it is no longer applicable).
trans-unit.target: 此方法的确切定义取决于实现，但通常它是从此路径派生的，该路径不包含冗余名称元素。在许多文件系统中，“ . ”和“ .. ”是特殊名称，用于指示当前目录和父目录。在这样的文件系统中，所有出现的“ . ”都被认为是多余的。如果在“ .. ”之前加上非“ .. ”名称，则这两个名称都被认为是多余的（重复标识此类名称的过程，直到不再适用为止）。

trans-unit.source: The preferred form is the official IANA primary name for an encoding. Applications which stream text data should always specify the charset in the mime type, which necessitates obtaining the encoding of the host platform for data (eg files) stored in that platform's encoding. A CharSet which corresponds to this and is suitable for use in a mime-type for a DocFlavor can be obtained from DocFlavor.hostEncoding This may not always be the primary IANA name but is guaranteed to be understood by this VM. For common flavors, the pre-defined *HOST DocFlavors may be used.

trans-unit.source: The prefixes, suffixes, and various symbols used for infinity, digits, grouping separators, decimal separators, etc. may be set to arbitrary values, and they will appear properly during formatting. However, care must be taken that the symbols and strings do not conflict, or parsing will be unreliable. For example, either the positive and negative prefixes or the suffixes must be distinct for DecimalFormat.parse() to be able to distinguish positive from negative values. (If they are identical, then DecimalFormat will behave as if no negative subpattern was specified.) Another example is that the decimal separator and grouping separator should be distinct characters, or parsing will be impossible.
trans-unit.target: 可以将用于无穷大的前缀，后缀和各种符号，数字，分组分隔符，十进制分隔符等设置为任意值，并且在格式化期间它们将正确显示。但是，必须注意符号和字符串不要冲突，否则解析将不可靠。例如，对于 DecimalFormat.parse() ，正负前缀或后缀必须不同，以便能够将正值与负值区分开。 （如果它们相同，则 DecimalFormat 的行为就像未指定负子模式一样。）另一个示例是十进制分隔符和分组分隔符应为不同的字符，否则将无法进行解析。

trans-unit.source: The primary distinction of an SSLEngine is that it operates on inbound and outbound byte streams, independent of the transport mechanism. It is the responsibility of the SSLEngine user to arrange for reliable I/O transport to the peer. By separating the SSL/TLS abstraction from the I/O transport mechanism, the SSLEngine can be used for a wide variety of I/O types, such as non-blocking I/O (polling), selectable non-blocking I/O, Socket and the traditional Input/OutputStreams, local ByteBuffers or byte arrays, future asynchronous I/O models , and so on.
trans-unit.target: SSLEngine 的主要区别在于，它对入站和出站字节流进行操作，而与传输机制无关。它是有责任 SSLEngine 用户对可靠的I / O传输到对等安排。通过将SSL / TLS抽象与I / O传输机制分开， SSLEngine 可用于多种I / O类型，例如 non-blocking I/O (polling) ， selectable non-blocking I/O ， Socket 和传统的Input / OutputStreams，本地 ByteBuffers 或字节数组，未来的异步I / O模型等。

It is the responsibility of the SSLEngine user to arrange for reliable I/O transport to the peer. By separating the SSL/TLS/DTLS abstraction from the I/O transport mechanism, the SSLEngine can be used for a wide variety of I/O types, such as non-blocking I/O (polling), selectable non-blocking I/O, Socket and the traditional Input/OutputStreams, local ByteBuffers or byte arrays, future asynchronous I/O models , and so on.

trans-unit.source: The primary entry point for HTML View implementations to get their attributes is the getViewAttributes method. This should be implemented to establish the desired policy used to associate attributes with the view. Each HTMLEditorKit (i.e. and therefore each associated JEditorPane) can have its own StyleSheet, but by default one sheet will be shared by all of the HTMLEditorKit instances. HTMLDocument instance can also have a StyleSheet, which holds the document-specific CSS specifications.
trans-unit.target: HTML View实现获取其属性的主要入口点是 getViewAttributes 方法。应该实现这一点，以建立用于将属性与视图关联的所需策略。每个HTMLEditorKit（即每个关联的JEditorPane）都可以具有自己的StyleSheet，但是默认情况下，所有HTMLEditorKit实例将共享一个图纸。 HTMLDocument实例还可以具有一个StyleSheet，其中包含特定于文档的CSS规范。

trans-unit.source: The primary method for awaiting completion and extracting results of a task is join(), but there are several variants: The Future.get() methods support interruptible and/or timed waits for completion and report results using Future conventions. Method invoke() is semantically equivalent to fork(); join() but always attempts to begin execution in the current thread. The "quiet" forms of these methods do not extract results or report exceptions. These may be useful when a set of tasks are being executed, and you need to delay processing of results or exceptions until all complete. Method invokeAll (available in multiple versions) performs the most common form of parallel invocation: forking a set of tasks and joining them all.
trans-unit.target: 等待完成和提取任务结果的主要方法是 join() ，但有几种变体： Future.get() 方法支持可中断和/或定时等待完成，并使用 Future 约定报告结果。方法 invoke() 在语义上等效于 fork(); join() 但始终尝试在当前线程中开始执行。这些方法的“安静”形式不会提取结果或报告异常。当正在执行一组任务时，这些功能可能很有用，并且您需要将结果或异常的处理延迟到全部完成为止。方法 invokeAll （有多个版本可用）执行并行调用的最常见形式：分派一组任务并将它们全部加入。

trans-unit.source: The primary method for awaiting completion and extracting results of a task is join(), but there are several variants: The Future.get() methods support interruptible and/or timed waits for completion and report results using Future conventions. Method invoke() is semantically equivalent to fork(); join() but always attempts to begin execution in the current thread. The "quiet" forms of these methods do not extract results or report exceptions. These may be useful when a set of tasks are being executed, and you need to delay processing of results or exceptions until all complete. Method invokeAll (available in multiple versions) performs the most common form of parallel invocation: forking a set of tasks and joining them all.
trans-unit.target: 等待完成和提取任务结果的主要方法是 join() ，但有几种变体： Future.get() 方法支持可中断和/或定时等待完成，并使用 Future 约定报告结果。方法 invoke() 在语义上等效于 fork(); join() 但始终尝试在当前线程中开始执行。这些方法的“ 安静 ”形式不会提取结果或报告异常。当执行一组任务时，这些功能可能很有用，并且您需要将结果或异常的处理延迟到所有任务完成为止。方法 invokeAll （有多个版本可用）执行并行调用的最常见形式：分派一组任务并将它们全部加入。

trans-unit.source: The principal methods are defined to allow the throwing of an exception. In normal use, no exceptions will be thrown, however one possible implementation would be to obtain the time from a central time server across the network. Obviously, in this case the lookup could fail, and so the method is permitted to throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 主要的方法被定义为允许抛出异常。在正常的使用中,不会抛出异常,但是有一种可能的实现是通过网络从中央时间服务器获取时间。显然,在这种情况下,查询可能会失败,所以该方法允许抛出异常。

trans-unit.source: The principal name can be specified in the configuration entry by using the option principal. The principal name can either be a simple user name, a service name such as host/mission.eng.sun.com, or "*". The principal can also be set using the system property sun.security.krb5.principal. This property is checked during login. If this property is not set, then the principal name from the configuration is used. In the case where the principal property is not set and the principal entry also does not exist, the user is prompted for the name. When this property of entry is set, and useTicketCache is set to true, only TGT belonging to this principal is used.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用选项 principal 在配置条目中指定主体名称。主体名称可以是简单的用户名，也可以是服务名称（例如 host/mission.eng.sun.com ）或“ *”。主体也可以使用系统属性 sun.security.krb5.principal 进行设置。登录期间检查此属性。如果未设置此属性，则使用配置中的主体名称。在没有设置主体属性且主体条目也不存在的情况下，系统会提示用户输入名称。设置entry的此属性并将 useTicketCache 设置为true时，仅使用属于此主体的TGT。

trans-unit.source: The principal operations on a StringBuffer are the append and insert methods, which are overloaded so as to accept data of any type. Each effectively converts a given datum to a string and then appends or inserts the characters of that string to the string buffer. The append method always adds these characters at the end of the buffer; the insert method adds the characters at a specified point.
trans-unit.target: StringBuffer 的主要操作是 append 和 insert 方法，它们会被重载以接受任何类型的数据。每个有效地将给定的基准转换为字符串，然后将该字符串的字符追加或插入到字符串缓冲区中。的 append 方法总是添加这些字符在缓冲区的末尾; 所述 insert 的方法在指定的点添加字符。

trans-unit.source: The principal operations on a StringBuilder are the append and insert methods, which are overloaded so as to accept data of any type. Each effectively converts a given datum to a string and then appends or inserts the characters of that string to the string builder. The append method always adds these characters at the end of the builder; the insert method adds the characters at a specified point.
trans-unit.target: StringBuilder 上的主要操作是 append 和 insert 方法，它们会被重载以接受任何类型的数据。每个有效地将给定的基准转换为字符串，然后将该字符串的字符追加或插入到字符串生成器中。的 append 方法总是添加这些字符在构建器的端部; 所述 insert 的方法在指定的点添加字符。

trans-unit.source: The principal purpose of these additions is to allow the specification of tables to use in encoding abbreviated streams. The built-in JPEG writer will also accept an ordinary ImageWriteParam, in which case the writer will construct the necessary tables internally.
trans-unit.target: 这些增加的主要目的是允许表的规范用于编码缩写流。内置的JPEG编写器还将接受一个普通的 ImageWriteParam ，在这种情况下，编写器将在内部构造必要的表。

trans-unit.source: The principal's hash code.
trans-unit.target: 校长的哈希码。

trans-unit.source: The principal's name.
trans-unit.target: 校长的名字。

trans-unit.source: The principal's string name.
trans-unit.target: 校长的串名。

trans-unit.source: The print data and the processing instructions are separate entities. This means that:
trans-unit.target: 打印数据和处理指令是独立的实体。这意味着:

trans-unit.source: The print data format is unspecified (just an octet stream)
trans-unit.target: 打印数据格式未指定(只是一个八位数流)。

trans-unit.source: The print service indicates that a - possibly transient - problem may require external intervention before the print service can continue.
trans-unit.target: 打印服务表明,在继续打印服务之前,可能需要外部干预来解决一个短暂的问题。

trans-unit.source: The print service indicates that a - possibly transient - problem may require external intervention before the print service can continue. One example of an event that can generate this message is when the printer runs out of paper.
trans-unit.target: 打印服务表明,在打印服务继续进行之前,可能需要外部干预,这可能是一个短暂的问题。可以产生此消息的事件的一个例子是当打印机用完纸时。

trans-unit.source: The print service reports that the job cannot be completed.
trans-unit.target: 打印服务报告说作业无法完成。

trans-unit.source: The print service reports that the job cannot be completed. The application must resubmit the job.
trans-unit.target: 打印服务报告说作业无法完成。该申请必须重新提交作业。

trans-unit.source: The printable area is specified to be a rectangle, within the overall dimensions of a media.
trans-unit.target: 可打印区域指定为矩形,在介质的整体尺寸内。

trans-unit.source: The printer attempts to make the external job attribute values take precedence over embedded instructions in the documents' print data, however there is no guarantee.
trans-unit.target: 打印机试图使外部作业属性值优先于文档打印数据中的嵌入指令,但无法保证。

trans-unit.source: The printer could not access one or more documents passed by reference (i.e., the print data representation object is a URL).
trans-unit.target: 打印机无法访问通过引用传递的一个或多个文档（即，打印数据表示对象是 URL ）。

trans-unit.source: The printer could not access one or more documents passed by reference (i.e., the print data representation object is a URL). This reason is intended to cover any file access problem,including file does not exist and access denied because of an access control problem. Whether the printer aborts the job and moves the job to the ABORTED job state or prints all documents that are accessible and moves the job to the COMPLETED job state and adds the COMPLETED_WITH_ERRORS reason to the job's JobStateReasons attribute depends on implementation and/or site policy. This value should be supported if the printer supports doc flavors with URL print data representation objects.
trans-unit.target: 打印机无法访问通过引用传递的一个或多个文档（即，打印数据表示对象是 URL ）。此原因旨在解决任何文件访问问题，包括文件不存在以及由于访问控制问题而导致的访问被拒绝。打印机是中止该作业并将其移动到 ABORTED 作业状态还是打印所有可访问的文档并将该作业移动到 COMPLETED 作业状态并将 COMPLETED_WITH_ERRORS 原因添加到作业的 JobStateReasons 属性取决于实现和/或站点策略。如果打印机支持带有 URL 打印数据表示对象的DocFlavor，则应支持此值。

trans-unit.source: The printer decides how to interpret the print data; the way this "autosensing" works is implementation dependent. In general, preformatted autosense print data is provided in a byte oriented representation class (byte array, InputStream, URL).
trans-unit.target: 打印机决定如何解释打印数据。这种“自动感应”的工作方式取决于实现。通常，在面向字节的表示形式类（字节数组， InputStream ， URL ）中提供预格式化的自动检测打印数据。

trans-unit.source: The printer decides how to interpret the print data; the way this "autosensing" works is implementation dependent. In general, preformatted autosense print data is provided in a byte oriented representation class (byte array, InputStream, URL).
trans-unit.target: 打印机决定如何解释打印数据;这种 "自动感应 "的工作方式取决于实施。一般来说,预格式化的自动感应打印数据是以一个面向字节的表示类(字节数组、InputStream、URL)提供的。

trans-unit.source: The printer has created the Print Job, but the printer has not finished accessing or accepting all the print data yet.
trans-unit.target: 打印机已经创建了打印任务,但打印机还没有完成访问或接受所有打印数据。

trans-unit.source: The printer has created the Print Job, but the printer is expecting additional print data before it can move the job into the PROCESSING state.
trans-unit.target: 打印机已创建“打印作业”，但是在将作业移至“ PROCESSING 状态之前，打印机需要其他打印数据。

trans-unit.source: The printer has created the Print Job, but the printer is expecting additional print data before it can move the job into the PROCESSING state. If a printer starts processing before it has received all data, the printer removes the JOB_DATA_INSUFFICIENT reason, but the JOB_INCOMING reason remains. If a printer starts processing after it has received all data, the printer removes the JOB_DATA_INSUFFICIENT and JOB_INCOMING reasons at the same time.
trans-unit.target: 打印机已创建“打印作业”，但是在将作业移至“ PROCESSING 状态之前，打印机需要其他打印数据。如果打印机在接收到所有数据之前就开始处理，则打印机将删除 JOB_DATA_INSUFFICIENT 原因，但保留 JOB_INCOMING 原因。如果打印机在接收到所有数据后开始处理，则打印机将同时删除 JOB_DATA_INSUFFICIENT 和 JOB_INCOMING 原因。

trans-unit.source: The printer has created the Print Job, but the printer is expecting additional print data before it can move the job into the PROCESSING state. If a printer starts processing before it has received all data, the printer removes the JOB_DATA_INSUFFICIENT reason, but the JOB_INCOMING reason remains. If a printer starts processing after it has received all data, the printer removes the JOB_DATA_INSUFFICIENT and JOB_INCOMING reasons at the same time.
trans-unit.target: 打印机已经创建了打印任务,但在将该任务转入PROCESSING状态之前,打印机正在等待其他打印数据。如果打印机在收到所有数据之前就开始处理,则打印机将删除JOB_DATA_INSUFFICIENT原因,但JOB_INCOMING原因仍然存在。如果打印机在收到所有数据后才开始处理,打印机将同时删除JOB_DATA_INSUFFICIENT和JOB_INCOMING原因。

trans-unit.source: The printer has detected an error other than ones listed below.
trans-unit.target: 打印机已检测到下列以外的错误。

trans-unit.source: The printer has made the job ready for printing, but the output device is not yet printing it, either because the job hasn't reached the output device or because the job is queued in the output device or some other spooler, awaiting the output device to print it.
trans-unit.target: 打印机已经做好了打印作业的准备,但输出设备还没有打印,可能是因为作业还没有到达输出设备,也可能是因为作业在输出设备或其他分线器中排队,等待输出设备打印。

trans-unit.source: The printer has scheduled a job on the output device and is in the process of connecting to a shared network output device (and might not be able to actually start printing the job for an arbitrarily long time depending on the usage of the output device by other servers on the network).
trans-unit.target: 打印机已经在输出设备上安排了一项作业,并且正在连接到共享网络输出设备的过程中(根据网络上其他服务器对输出设备的使用情况,可能在任意长的时间内无法实际开始打印作业)。

trans-unit.source: The printer is capable of some type of color printing, such as highlight color or full process color.
trans-unit.target: 打印机能够进行某种类型的彩色打印,如高光色或全过程彩色。

trans-unit.source: The printer is currently accepting jobs.
trans-unit.target: 打印机目前正在接受作业。

trans-unit.source: The printer is currently rejecting any jobs sent to it.
trans-unit.target: 打印机目前正在拒绝任何发送到它的作业。

trans-unit.source: The printer is in the process of stopping the device and will be stopped in a while.
trans-unit.target: 打印机正在停止设备的过程中,一会儿就会停止。

trans-unit.source: The printer is in the process of stopping the device and will be stopped in a while. When the device is stopped, the printer will change the PrinterState to STOPPED. The STOPPING reason is never an error, even for a printer with a single output device. When an output device ceases accepting jobs, the printer's PrinterStateReasons will have this reason while the output device completes printing.
trans-unit.target: 打印机正在停止设备，将在一段时间后停止。当设备停止时，打印机会将 PrinterState 更改为 STOPPED 。即使对于具有单个输出设备的打印机，“ STOPPING 原因也绝不会出错。当输出设备停止接受作业时，在输出设备完成打印时，打印机的 PrinterStateReasons 将具有此原因。

trans-unit.source: The printer is in the process of stopping the device and will be stopped in a while. When the device is stopped, the printer will change the PrinterState to STOPPED. The STOPPING reason is never an error, even for a printer with a single output device. When an output device ceases accepting jobs, the printer's PrinterStateReasons will have this reason while the output device completes printing.
trans-unit.target: 打印机正在停止设备，将在一段时间后停止。当设备停止时，打印机会将 PrinterState 更改为STOPPED。即使对于具有单个输出设备的打印机，“停止”原因也绝不会出错。当输出设备停止接受作业时，在输出设备完成打印时，打印机的 PrinterStateReasons 将具有此原因。

trans-unit.source: The printer is not capable of any type of color printing.
trans-unit.target: 该打印机不能进行任何类型的彩色打印。

trans-unit.source: The printer is off-line and accepting no jobs.
trans-unit.target: 打印机处于离线状态,不接受任何作业。

trans-unit.source: The printer is off-line and accepting no jobs. All PENDING jobs are put into the PENDING_HELD state. This situation could be true if the service's or document transform's input is impaired or broken.
trans-unit.target: 打印机脱机，不接受任何作业。所有 PENDING 作业均处于 PENDING_HELD 状态。如果服务或文档转换的输入受损或损坏，则这种情况可能是正确的。

trans-unit.source: The printer is off-line and accepting no jobs. All PENDING jobs are put into the PENDING_HELD state. This situation could be true if the service's or document transform's input is impaired or broken.
trans-unit.target: 打印机处于离线状态,不接受任何作业。所有 PENDING 作业都进入 PENDING_HELD 状态。如果服务或文档转换的输入受损或中断,则可能出现这种情况。

trans-unit.source: The printer is transmitting the job to the output device.
trans-unit.target: 打印机正在将作业传送到输出设备。

trans-unit.source: The printer makes no attempt to make the external job attribute values take precedence over embedded instructions in the documents' print data.
trans-unit.target: 打印机不会试图使外部作业属性值优先于文档打印数据中的嵌入指令。

trans-unit.source: The printer should make reasonable attempts to print the job, even if it cannot print it exactly as specified.
trans-unit.target: 打印机应合理地尝试打印作业,即使不能完全按照指定的方式打印。

trans-unit.source: The printer state is unknown.
trans-unit.target: 打印机状态未知。

trans-unit.source: The printing system may request a page index more than once. On each occasion equal PageFormat parameters will be supplied.
trans-unit.target: 打印系统可能会多次要求提供页面索引。每次都将提供相同的PageFormat参数。

trans-unit.source: The printing system will call Printable.print(..) with page indexes which increase monotonically, although as noted above, the Printable should expect multiple calls for a page index and that page indexes may be skipped, when page ranges are specified by the client, or by a user through a print dialog.
trans-unit.target: 打印系统将使用页面索引单调增加的 Printable.print(..) 进行调用，尽管如上所述，当客户端指定页面范围时， Printable 应该期望多次调用页面索引，并且可能会跳过页面索引，或由用户通过打印对话框。

trans-unit.source: The printwriter associated with this console
trans-unit.target: 与该控制台相关联的打印服务器

trans-unit.source: The priority level of this glyph as it is growing.
trans-unit.target: 这个字形的优先级,因为它在成长。

trans-unit.source: The priority level of this glyph as it is shrinking.
trans-unit.target: 这个字形的优先级,因为它在缩小。

trans-unit.source: The priority of the newly created thread is set equal to the priority of the thread creating it, that is, the currently running thread. The method setPriority may be used to change the priority to a new value.
trans-unit.target: 新创建的线程的优先级设置为等于创建它的线程的优先级，即当前正在运行的线程。setPriority方法可用于将优先级更改为新值。

trans-unit.source: The priority of the newly created thread is set equal to the priority of the thread creating it, that is, the currently running thread. The method setPriority may be used to change the priority to a new value.
trans-unit.target: 新创建的线程的优先级设置为等于创建它的线程的优先级，即当前正在运行的线程。setPriority方法可用于将优先级更改为新值。

trans-unit.source: The priority of the thread associated with this ThreadInfo.
trans-unit.target: 与此 ThreadInfo 关联的线程的优先级。

trans-unit.source: The probe result is the string form of the value of a Multipurpose Internet Mail Extension (MIME) content type as defined by RFC 2045: Multipurpose Internet Mail Extensions (MIME) Part One: Format of Internet Message Bodies. The string must be parsable according to the grammar in the RFC 2045.
trans-unit.target: 探测结果是RFC 2045定义的多用途Internet邮件扩展（MIME）内容类型的值的字符串形式：多用途Internet邮件扩展（MIME）第一部分：Internet邮件正文的格式。该字符串必须根据RFC 2045中的语法可解析。

trans-unit.source: The probe result is the string form of the value of a Multipurpose Internet Mail Extension (MIME) content type as defined by RFC 2045: Multipurpose Internet Mail Extensions (MIME) Part One: Format of Internet Message Bodies. The string must be parsable according to the grammar in the RFC 2045.
trans-unit.target: 探测结果是RFC 2045定义的多用途Internet邮件扩展（MIME）内容类型的值的字符串形式：多用途Internet邮件扩展（MIME）第一部分：Internet邮件正文的格式。根据RFC 2045中的语法，字符串必须是可解析的。

trans-unit.source: The process is not killed when there are no more references to the Process object, but rather the process continues executing asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: 当不再有对 Process 对象的引用时，不会终止该进程，而是继续继续异步执行。

trans-unit.source: The process may be observed to have terminated with isAlive() before the ComputableFuture is completed and dependent actions are invoked.
trans-unit.target: 在ComputableFuture完成并调用相关操作之前，可以观察到该过程已使用 isAlive() 终止。

trans-unit.source: The process may not terminate immediately. i.e. isAlive() may return true for a brief period after destroyForcibly() is called. This method may be chained to waitFor() if needed.
trans-unit.target: 该过程可能不会立即终止。即 isAlive() 可能在调用 destroyForcibly() 之后的很短时间内返回true 。如果需要，可以将此方法链接到 waitFor() 。

trans-unit.source: The process of implementing a set by extending this class is identical to that of implementing a Collection by extending AbstractCollection, except that all of the methods and constructors in subclasses of this class must obey the additional constraints imposed by the Set interface (for instance, the add method must not permit addition of multiple instances of an object to a set).
trans-unit.target: 通过扩展此类来实现集合的过程与通过扩展AbstractCollection来实现Collection的过程相同，不同之处在于，此类的子类中的所有方法和构造函数都必须服从 Set 接口施加的附加约束（例如， add方法不得允许将一个对象的多个实例添加到集合中）。

trans-unit.source: The process of normalization is specific to each calendar system. For example, in the ISO calendar system, the years and months are normalized but the days are not, such that "15 months" would be normalized to "1 year and 3 months".
trans-unit.target: 归一化过程是每个日历系统所特有的。例如,在国际标准化组织的日历系统中,年和月是正常化的,但天数不是,例如,"15个月 "将被正常化为 "1年3个月"。

trans-unit.source: The process of writing changes in a RowSet object to its data source is known as
trans-unit.target: 将 RowSet 对象中的更改写入其数据源的过程称为

trans-unit.source: The process that looks for a class name in the META-INF/services/org.xml.sax.driver file in a jar file does not conform to the specification of the service-provider loading facility as defined in ServiceLoader and therefore does not support modularization. It is deprecated as of Java SE 9 and subject to removal in a future release.
trans-unit.target: 在jar文件中的 META-INF/services/org.xml.sax.driver 文件中查找类名的过程不符合 ServiceLoader 中定义的服务提供者加载工具的规范，因此不支持模块化。从Java SE 9开始不推荐使用，并且在将来的发行版中将其删除。

trans-unit.source: The processing instruction does not specify how the print job processes the request; each processing instruction is only a description of the results of a print job. The print job determines the manner in which it achieves the results specified by the processing instructions. Representing processing instructions as descriptive items provides more flexibility for implementing print jobs.
trans-unit.target: 处理指令并不指定打印作业如何处理请求,每条处理指令只是对打印作业结果的描述。打印作业决定了它实现处理指令所指定的结果的方式。将处理指令表示为描述性项目,为打印作业的实施提供了更大的灵活性。

trans-unit.source: The processor may choose to continue, but will not normally proceed to a successful completion.
trans-unit.target: 处理器可以选择继续,但一般不会进行到成功完成。

trans-unit.source: The profile includes the redColorantTag, greenColorantTag, blueColorantTag, redTRCTag, greenTRCTag, blueTRCTag, and mediaWhitePointTag tags.
trans-unit.target: 该配置文件包括 redColorantTag ， greenColorantTag ， blueColorantTag ， redTRCTag ， greenTRCTag ， blueTRCTag 和 mediaWhitePointTag 标签。

trans-unit.source: The profile's color space type is RGB.
trans-unit.target: 配置文件的色彩空间类型是RGB。

trans-unit.source: The program
trans-unit.target: 该计划

trans-unit.source: The program number is zero-based (expressed from 0 to 127). Note that MIDI hardware displays and literature about MIDI typically use the range 1 to 128 instead.
trans-unit.target: 程序号以零为基础(从0到127表示)。请注意,MIDI硬件显示器和有关MIDI的文献通常使用1到128的范围。

trans-unit.source: The program number is zero-based (expressed from 0 to 127). Note that MIDI hardware displays and literature about MIDI typically use the range 1 to 128 instead. It is possible that the underlying synthesizer does not support a specific program. In order to verify that a call to programChange was successful, use getProgram.
trans-unit.target: 程序号从零开始（从0到127）。请注意，MIDI硬件显示和有关MIDI的文献通常使用1到128范围。基础合成器可能不支持特定程序。为了验证对 programChange 的调用是否成功，请使用 getProgram 。

trans-unit.source: The program number of the instrument that this voice is currently using.
trans-unit.target: 该声音当前使用的乐器的程序号。

trans-unit.source: The program number of the instrument that this voice is currently using. The value ranges from 0 to 127 if the voice is active, and is unspecified if the voice is inactive.
trans-unit.target: 该声音当前使用的乐器的程序号。如果声音处于活动状态,该值的范围为0至127,如果声音处于非活动状态,则未指定。

trans-unit.source: The programmatic name of the property that was changed. May be null if multiple properties have changed.
trans-unit.target: 被更改的属性的程序名称。如果有多个属性发生变化,则可能为空。

trans-unit.source: The programmatic name of the property/method/event
trans-unit.target: 属性/方法/事件的程序名称。

trans-unit.source: The programmer should generally provide a void (no argument) and Collection constructor, as per the recommendation in the Collection interface specification.

trans-unit.source: The properties returned should contain properties set by the stylesheet, and these properties are "defaulted" by default properties specified by section 16 of the XSL Transformations (XSLT) W3C Recommendation. The properties that were specifically set by the stylesheet should be in the base Properties list, while the XSLT default properties that were not specifically set should be in the "default" Properties list. Thus, getOutputProperties().getProperty(String key) will obtain any property in that was set by the stylesheet, or the default properties, while getOutputProperties().get(String key) will only retrieve properties that were explicitly set in the stylesheet.

trans-unit.source: The property value consists of the provider class name and the device name, separated by the hash mark ("#"). Either the class name, or the device name may be omitted. If only the class name is specified, the trailing hash mark is optional.

trans-unit.source: The protocol handler calls this method after a resource has been retrieved, and the ResponseCache must decide whether or not to store the resource in its cache. If the resource is to be cached, then put() must return a CacheRequest object which contains an OutputStream that the protocol handler will use to write the resource into the cache. If the resource is not to be cached, then put must return null.
trans-unit.target: 协议处理程序在资源被检索后调用这个方法,ResponseCache必须决定是否将资源存储在其缓存中。如果资源要被缓存,那么 put()必须返回一个 CacheRequest 对象,该对象包含一个输出流,协议处理程序将使用该输出流把资源写入缓存。如果资源不被缓存,那么put必须返回null。

trans-unit.source: The public methods of all CertStoreSpi objects must be thread-safe. That is, multiple threads may concurrently invoke these methods on a single CertStoreSpi object (or more than one) with no ill effects. This allows a CertPathBuilder to search for a CRL while simultaneously searching for further certificates, for instance.
trans-unit.target: 所有 CertStoreSpi 对象的公共方法必须是线程安全的。也就是说，多个线程可以在一个 CertStoreSpi 对象（或多个）上并发调用这些方法，而不会产生不良影响。例如，这允许 CertPathBuilder 搜索CRL，同时搜索其他证书。

trans-unit.source: The publisher returned by the body method can be subscribed to only once. The first subscriber will receive the body response bytes if successfully subscribed, or will cause the subscription to be cancelled otherwise. If more subscriptions are attempted, the subsequent subscribers will be immediately subscribed with an empty subscription and their onError method will be invoked with an IllegalStateException.
trans-unit.target: 由 body 方法返回的发布者只能订阅一次。如果成功订阅，第一个订阅者将收到正文响应字节，否则将导致取消订阅。如果尝试更多的订阅，则随后的订阅者将立即以空订阅进行订阅，并且将使用 IllegalStateException 调用其 onError 方法。

trans-unit.source: The range of a duration requires the storage of a number larger than a long. To achieve this, the class stores a long representing seconds and an int representing nanosecond-of-second, which will always be between 0 and 999,999,999. The model is of a directed duration, meaning that the duration may be negative.
trans-unit.target: 持续时间的范围要求存储的数字大于 long 的数字。为实现此目的，该类存储一个代表秒的 long int 和一个代表纳秒的int值，它们始终在0到999,999,999之间。该模型具有定向持续时间，这意味着持续时间可能为负。

trans-unit.source: The range of an instant requires the storage of a number larger than a long. To achieve this, the class stores a long representing epoch-seconds and an int representing nanosecond-of-second, which will always be between 0 and 999,999,999. The epoch-seconds are measured from the standard Java epoch of 1970-01-01T00:00:00Z where instants after the epoch have positive values, and earlier instants have negative values. For both the epoch-second and nanosecond parts, a larger value is always later on the time-line than a smaller value.
trans-unit.target: 瞬时范围要求存储的数字大于 long 的数字。为实现此目的，该类存储一个 long int 代表纪元秒）和一个整数（代表毫微秒），该整数始终在0到999,999,999之间。纪元秒是从 1970-01-01T00:00:00Z 的标准Java纪元开始测量的，其中纪元后的时刻具有正值，而较早的时刻具有负值。对于时代秒和纳秒部分，始终在时间轴上晚于较大值，而不是较小值。

trans-unit.source: The readObject method is responsible for reading and restoring the state of the object for its particular class using data written to the stream by the corresponding writeObject method. The method does not need to concern itself with the state belonging to its superclasses or subclasses. State is restored by reading data from the ObjectInputStream for the individual fields and making assignments to the appropriate fields of the object. Reading primitive data types is supported by DataInput.
trans-unit.target: readObject方法负责使用对应的writeObject方法写入流的数据读取和恢复其特定类的对象的状态。该方法不需要关注属于其超类或子类的状态。通过从ObjectInputStream中读取各个字段的数据并对对象的相应字段进行赋值来恢复状态。读取基元数据类型由DataInput支持。

trans-unit.source: The readObject method is responsible for reading from the stream and restoring the classes fields. It may call in.defaultReadObject to invoke the default mechanism for restoring the object's non-static and non-transient fields. The defaultReadObject method uses information in the stream to assign the fields of the object saved in the stream with the correspondingly named fields in the current object. This handles the case when the class has evolved to add new fields. The method does not need to concern itself with the state belonging to its superclasses or subclasses. State is restored by reading data from the ObjectInputStream for the individual fields and making assignments to the appropriate fields of the object. Reading primitive data types is supported by DataInput.
trans-unit.target: readObject方法负责从流中读取并恢复类的字段,它可以调用in.defaultReadObject来调用默认机制来恢复对象的非静态和非瞬态字段。它可以调用in.defaultReadObject来调用默认机制来恢复对象的非静态和非瞬态字段。defaultReadObject方法使用流中的信息,将流中保存的对象的字段与当前对象中相应名称的字段进行分配。这处理了类已经发展到增加新字段的情况。该方法不需要关注属于其超类或子类的状态。通过从ObjectInputStream中读取各个字段的数据,并对对象的相应字段进行赋值来恢复状态。读取基元数据类型由DataInput支持。
